name: MatchMate.Me
tag_list: matchmaking, dating, match, online, free, singles, matchmaker, matchmakers, suggestions, date, matching
overview:
We are bringing matchmaking into the 21st Century with a matchmaking tool that works. MatchMate is breaking new ground on a new vertical - mediating the human process of matchmaking with an easy-to-use platform that makes the matching process less awkward and more private. It is matchmaking for everyone. Value propositions come in two forms: they solve a problem or they fulfill a human social need. Everyone has the social need of friendship, matchmaking, dating, and love.

MatchMate mediates human matchmaking online like never before. People always ask, “what about online dating sites?” We are not an online dating site. We are an online matchmaking platform. Online dating sites use computer algorithms to set up their users based on categories. People don’t fall in love with categories! People fall in love with people. The beauty of matchmaking is it’s high success rate due to it’s vouching system. When someone matchmakes, they are saying “I think you’d be great with so-and-so”. The matchmaker is vouching for their friend, co-worker, family member, or whoever.

MatchMate mediates all of that online. No one has done that until now. With MatchMate users can match two people or even match themselves. Users can take it a step further and leverage their social networks to find an even better match. MatchMate is very powerful and is disrupting the online dating industry.
